title: help me to identify this font, please
author: Fugu_Fish

comments.content: **[Angel of Blood Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317214856/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Angel%20of%20Blood%20Light%20-%20Regular&fid=0f54f6359169eaef575dd91579997a13&fsize=60&text=Creeping%20Death%20Recordings%20L.A.&fit=1)** by Maelle.K [Free for personal use]
